posts.post_content:
At first glance, this has all the appearance of a NM card, but there are surface creases on the front (not the back).  They're really are hard to see.  

Full disclosure: I bought this card graded a 1-2 (I can't remember, but it was low grade) from another board member because it appeared to have major paper loss on the back.  Once it arrived, I realized it was actually paper residue, not paper loss, so I cracked it out and soaked it (just plain water).  No paper loss at all.

$45 OBO delivered PP gift (or add 3% for regular PP).
